name: Age Calculator
desc: Age Calculator is a simple app that calculates your age based on the year you were born.

desc: Calculator with Voice Recognition is a simple app that can perform basic arithmetic operations.

name: Color Flipper

desc: Countdown Timer is a simple app that can count down from a given time.

name: Web Drum Kit
